description: jQuery Slider is easy to use and multifunctional jQuery plugin.
name: jquery-slider
readme:
jquery-slider
=====================

Amazing nice slider made by Egor Khmelev.

https://github.com/egorkhmelev/jslider

I have just review build process.

Installation
------------

Using npm:

```
npm install jquery-slider
```

How to use it
-------------

TODO

assuming you already have `grunt` installed, otherwise you also need to do:

```
npm install -g grunt-cli
```
